text:
@Mike_Pence How the fork can you say you stand for the sanctity of human life when you and the ATM* have killed over 130k from Covd19, let the Kurds be slaughtered, killed babies in cages at the southern border? Not to mention cutting SNAP funding.  The audacity! 
*artificially tanned moron
